overview.en: TXT is short for TRUST, which is the token issued by TRUST Game Platform on EOS. TXT uses an innovative token economic design to reward contributors of TRUST Platform. Hold TXT now to share 50%+ profit of TRUST Platform. TeamTrust is developers behind TRUST Platform. The team is composed of game veterans and blockchain geeks (10+ games shipped in total, including 2 blockchain games). Their vision is to build a better EOS ecosystem with games, and continuously pushing the boundaries of EOS DApp development.
